lexUnit.name: emit.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: discharge; send forth or give out.

sentence.text: A black hole emits radiation as if it were a hot body .

We could look for the gamma rays that the primordial black holes emit during most of their lifetime .

All matter at temperatures above that of absolute zero emits infrared radiation .
But a body with a particular temperature must emit radiation at a certain rate .
A neurone will emit impulses at a rate of from zero up to several hundred per second .
When the bat hunts , it emits a string of pulses at a rate of about ten a second .
